markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ferocious Gust](/Feats.aspx?ID=2652) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

</column>

---

With heavy wing beats, you whip up a furious gust and direct it at your opponents. This air blast has the effects of [_gust of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
name: Ferocious Gust
